alert.note: Alert for Morris; Red River; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 7:30PM CDT until September 08 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Morris County in northeastern Texas... Northern Titus County in northeastern Texas... South central Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 729 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilkerson, or 7 miles west of Boxelder, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Boxelder, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Wilkerson, Cookville, Talco, Harts Bluff, and Cuthand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
